mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM teaching t LEFT JOIN teaching_office tf ON t.id = tf.teaching_id WHERE office_id = #{officeId} AND t.type = 1 AND t.is_del = 1 AND tf.is_del = 1
SELECT t2.* FROM teaching t1 LEFT JOIN teaching t2 ON t1.id = t2.parent_id WHERE t1.id = #{teachingId} AND t1.type = 1 AND t2.type = 2 AND t1.is_del = 1 AND t2.is_del = 1
SELECT t3.* FROM teaching t2 LEFT JOIN teaching t3 ON t2.id = t3.parent_id WHERE t2.id = #{teachingId} AND t2.type = 2 AND t3.type = 3 AND t2.is_del = 1 AND t3.is_del = 1

SELECT o.name'officename',t.* FROM user_office uo LEFT JOIN office o ON uo.office_id = o.id LEFT JOIN teaching_office tf ON o.id = tf.office_id LEFT JOIN teaching t ON t.id = tf.teaching_id WHERE uo.user_id = #{userId} AND o.office_type = 3 AND o.is_del = 1 AND uo.is_del = 1 AND tf.is_del = 1 AND t.is_del = 1

SELECT t2.* FROM teaching t1 LEFT JOIN teaching t2 ON t1.id = t2.parent_id WHERE t1.id IN
(SELECT t.id FROM teaching t LEFT JOIN teaching_office tf ON t.id = tf.teaching_id WHERE office_id IN (SELECT uo.office_id FROM user_office uo LEFT JOIN office o ON uo.office_id = o.id WHERE uo.user_id = #{userId} AND o.office_type = 3 AND o.is_del = 1 AND uo.is_del = 1) AND t.type = 1 AND t.is_del = 1 AND tf.is_del = 1)
AND t1.type = 1 AND t2.type = 2 AND t1.is_del = 1 AND t2.is_del = 1

SELECT t3.* FROM teaching t2 LEFT JOIN teaching t3 ON t2.id = t3.parent_id WHERE t2.id IN
(SELECT t2.id FROM teaching t1 LEFT JOIN teaching t2 ON t1.id = t2.parent_id WHERE t1.id IN
(SELECT t.id FROM teaching t LEFT JOIN teaching_office tf ON t.id = tf.teaching_id WHERE office_id IN (SELECT uo.office_id FROM user_office uo LEFT JOIN office o ON uo.office_id = o.id WHERE uo.user_id = #{userId} AND o.office_type = 3 AND o.is_del = 1 AND uo.is_del = 1) AND t.type = 1 AND t.is_del = 1 AND tf.is_del = 1)
AND t1.type = 1 AND t2.type = 2 AND t1.is_del = 1 AND t2.is_del = 1)
AND t2.type = 2 AND t3.type = 3 AND t2.is_del = 1 AND t3.is_del = 1
